levites jeshua kadmiel bani hashabniah sherebiah hodijah shebaniah pethahiah stand_up bless lord your_god ever ever bless thy glorious name exalt blessing praise
thou thou art lord alone thou hast heaven heavens host earth and_all things therein seas and_all_that_is therein thou preservest host heaven worshippeth thee
thou art lord god didst choose abram broughtest forth chaldees gavest name abraham foundest heart faithful thee madest a_covenant land canaanites hittites amorites perizzites jebusites girgashites seed hast perform thy words thou art righteous didst see affliction fathers egypt heardest cry red sea shewedst signs wonders pharaoh servants people land thou knewest deal proudly
didst thou get name day
thou didst sea so_that midst sea dry land persecutors thou threwest deeps stone mighty waters
moreover thou leddest day a_cloudy pillar night pillar fire light in_the_way
thou camest upon mount sinai spakest heaven gavest right judgments true laws good statutes commandments madest know thy holy sabbath commandedst precepts statutes laws hand moses thy servant gavest bread heaven hunger broughtest forth water rock thirst promisedst go_in possess land thou hadst swear
fathers deal proudly harden necks hearken thy commandments refuse obey mindful thy wonders thou didst harden necks rebellion appoint a_captain return_to bondage thou art god ready pardon gracious merciful slow anger great kindness forsookest
yea molten calf thy god bring thee egypt work great provocations yet thou thy manifold mercies forsookest wilderness pillar cloud depart day lead in_the_way pillar fire night shew light way
thou gavest thy good spirit instruct withheldest thy manna mouth gavest water thirst
yea forty years didst thou sustain wilderness lack nothing clothes old feet swell
moreover thou gavest kingdoms nations didst divide corners possess land sihon land king heshbon land king bashan
children multipliedst thou stars heaven broughtest land concern thou hadst promise fathers go_in possess
children went_in possess land thou subduedst inhabitants land canaanites gavest hands kings people land
strong cities fat land possessed houses full all_goods wells digged vineyards oliveyards fruit trees abundance eat fill become fat delighted thy great goodness
nevertheless disobedient rebel thee cast thy law backs slew thy prophets testify turn thee work great provocations
therefore thou deliveredst hand enemies vex time trouble cry unto thee thou heardest heaven according_to thy manifold mercies thou gavest saviours save hand enemies
rest evil thee therefore leftest thou land enemies dominion yet return cry unto thee thou heardest heaven many_times didst thou deliver according_to thy mercies testifiedst thou mightest bring thy law yet deal proudly hearken unto thy commandments sin thy judgments man live_in withdraw shoulder harden neck hear
yet years didst thou forbear testifiedst thy spirit thy prophets yet ear therefore gavest thou hand people lands
nevertheless thy great mercies sake thou didst utterly consume forsake thou art gracious merciful god
now therefore great mighty terrible god keepest covenant mercy let trouble seem little thee hath come_upon kings princes priests prophets fathers thy people time kings assyria day
howbeit thou art all_that_is brought_upon thou hast right wickedly kings princes priests fathers keep thy law hearken thy commandments thy testimonies wherewith thou didst testify
have_not serve thee kingdom thy great goodness thou gavest large fat land thou gavest turn wicked works
behold servants day land thou gavest fathers eat fruit thereof good thereof servants yieldeth much increase kings thou hast set because_of sins dominion bodies cattle pleasure great distress
because_of sure covenant write princes levites priests seal

now lie still quiet sleep rest kings counsellors earth build desolate places princes gold fill houses silver hidden untimely birth as_infants never saw light

small great servant free master
wherefore light that_is misery life bitter soul long death cometh dig more_than hid treasures rejoice exceedingly glad grave
light man way hid god hath hedge

thing greatly fear come_upon afraid

eliphaz temanite answer assay commune thee wilt thou grieve
withhold speak
behold thou hast instruct thou hast strengthen weak hands
thy words have_upholden fall thou hast strengthen feeble knees
now come_upon thee thou faintest toucheth thee thou art trouble
thy fear thy confidence thy hope uprightness thy ways
remember pray thee ever perish innocent
righteous cut_off
see plow iniquity sow wickedness reap
blast god perish breath nostrils consume
roaring lion voice fierce lion teeth young lions break

now thing secretly brought_to mine ear receive little thereof
thoughts visions night deep sleep falleth men fear tremble bones shake
spirit pass face hair flesh stand stand still discern form thereof image mine eyes silence hear voice mortal man god
man pure maker
behold put trust servants angels charge folly much less dwell houses clay foundation dust crush moth
destroy morning perish ever regard
doth excellency away
die wisdom
call now answer thee saints wilt thou turn
wrath killeth foolish man envy slayeth silly
see foolish taking root suddenly curse habitation
children far safety crush gate deliver
hungry eateth taketh thorns robber swalloweth substance
affliction cometh forth dust doth trouble spring ground yet man bear unto trouble sparks fly upward
seek unto god unto god commit cause doeth great things unsearchable marvellous things number giveth rain earth sendeth waters fields set_up high low mourn exalt safety
disappointeth devices crafty hands perform enterprise
taketh wise craftiness counsel froward carry headlong
meet darkness day_time grope noonday as_in night
saveth poor sword mouth hand mighty
poor hath hope iniquity stoppeth mouth
behold happy man god correcteth therefore despise thou chastening almighty maketh sore bindeth up_he woundeth hands whole
deliver thee troubles yea evil touch thee
famine redeem thee death war power sword
thou shalt hide scourge tongue shalt thou afraid destruction cometh
destruction famine thou shalt shalt thou afraid beasts earth
